channel.title: 525 RandomScape - Help :(- Connecting To Update Server
channel.description:
Well I've decided I would try to move up from 317 to better servers. Well I decided I would try RandomScape. So I download it, change the ip like it says to on the thread, then I run windows 7.
The problem is it gets stuck on "Connecting to Update Server" I have no idea how to get it to work.
I'm really eager to play it, I would appreciate it bunches if you could help!

item.title: 525 RandomScape - Help :(- Connecting To Update Server
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Oh i’m sorry your right it is client
I like 317’s I just want to move on to better things, I want better graphics and skillcape emotes lol

Read full topic
